response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. I believe its worth surpasses any monetary valuation and would bring unparalleled benefits to you. After careful consideration, I propose to offer it to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also the potential it holds for you. I am confident that this investment will yield significant returns and satisfaction in the years to come. Please let me know if you wish to discuss this further or if there's anything else I can provide to help you make a decision.", "product_price": 1200000}
